Customer ratings by feature

Additional details

With crystal clear 2K HD video, the Tapo C211 Home Security Wi-Fi Pan/Tilt camera gives you the ability to always keep an eye on your family, pets, and protect your home. With person and motion detection, get instant notifications that matter when there is activity going on. Also used as a baby camera monitor, Tapo C211 provides free baby crying detection. Check what's inside your home, even at night with night vision thanks to the integrated IR sensor. With device sharing, you and a family member can both monitor the feed making keeping an eye on the little ones just a little bit easier Record footage continuously onto a 512 GB micro-SD card (not included) or subscribe to Tapo Care for 30-day video history and many other benefits like Rich Notification, Video Summary and more. [Before purchasing a microSD card, please check the TP-Link website FAQ to ensure compatibility with your device.] Adjust the cameras field of view across 360 horizontally and 114 vertically with the pan/tilt controls in the app to focus the camera on the areas you want. With crisp 2-way audio, you'll never truly be away again with the ability to hold clear conversations with who's there. Additionally, keep your family safe from unwanted intruders by playing the built-in siren and light alarm.

I'm on a Nest system and you can't select between 2.4 or 5 so it took a couple of tries for it to register on the 2.4 frequency.

      Color: WhiteStyle: 2-Pack

      As a parent of a young child and a pet owner, I found these cameras to be incredibly versatile. The 2K resolution provides crisp, detailed images, making it easy to check on my sleeping baby or monitor my dog when I'm away.

      The pan and tilt feature is a standout, allowing me to remotely adjust the camera's view through the app. This proved particularly useful when my toddler moved out of frame or when I wanted to scan different areas of a room.

      The two-way audio function works well for soothing a fussy baby or giving commands to a pet. The built-in siren, while loud, offers an added layer of security if needed.

      Night vision is clear and effective, providing reassurance during nighttime check-ins. Motion detection alerts are customizable and generally accurate, though they can be overly sensitive at times.

      Setup was straightforward, and integration with Alexa allowed for easy voice control. The option for both cloud and local storage is appreciated for flexibility and privacy concerns.

      One minor drawback is that the app can occasionally be slow to connect, causing a slight delay in live viewing.

    • KD
      5.0 out of 5 starsVerified Purchase
      Love this camera
      Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2025
      Color: WhiteStyle: 1-Pack
      1.
      I did hours of research trying to find a budget friendly, quality camera, WITH NO SUBSCRIPTION. This camera is perfect! I use it to check in on my cats during the day since I leave at 4am and get home at 2pm. The night vision and day vision camera quality is surprisingly... See more
      I did hours of research trying to find a budget friendly, quality camera, WITH NO SUBSCRIPTION. This camera is perfect! I use it to check in on my cats during the day since I leave at 4am and get home at 2pm. The night vision and day vision camera quality is surprisingly good (the camera doesn't zoom in but you can zoom in on your screen on the app). The app is easy to use as well and I haven't had any connectivity issues at all. My Wi-Fi is 5ghz but in the My Spectrum app it lets you switch it to 2.5ghz temporarily to set up the camera and it was super easy and worked well. I have been using the camera for a week now and I don't regret buying it (except I should have got a 2 pack). It has a privacy mode to turn off the camera when I am home which is nice. The cable is probably close to 8 feet long. The speaker is decent and it has a mini SD card slot. I like that it also has an option for both motion detection and person detection. I don't want notifications every time my cats run back and forth but I do want to know if there is someone in my house so I leave only the person detection on and it works 100% of the time (my mom goes over to visit them and it always sends notifications). I use it for security at night too with the alarm system you can set up. You can chose lights, siren, or both and you can set it for manual on or scheduled. Gives me an extra peace of mind on the nights I am home alone. 100% recommend this camera (save yourself the hours of research, I did it for you)!!!
